sentence.Network_en: Sometimes we are not consciously aware of these feelings.
sentence.Network_cn: 有时候我们没有意识到这些情感。

sentence.Network_en: The place is as self-consciously trendy as they come.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个地方非常有意识地追求时髦。

sentence.Network_en: The world which the book inhabits seems too self-consciously literary, too introverted.
sentence.Network_cn: 该书所描绘的世界似乎过分刻意地追求文学性，过于内敛含蓄。

PerfectNetExp.abs: LSAT红宝书1 - 豆丁网 ... conscientious 尽责的 consciously 有意识地,自觉地 conscription 征召.

list.abs: 一、民族意识的界定民族意识(national consciousness)是一个内涵和外延都很丰富的概念。恩格斯(1844)首先提出“民族意识”一词,但没有给出明确的定义。我国最早给.
心理学专业词汇翻译辞典 - MBA智库文档 ... legal authority 法定权威 legal consciousness 法律意识 legal guarantee 法律保证.
四、集体意识（collective consciousness）的外在世界，有共同价值与形式的文化世界。 人格中最深、最不易碰触到得层次。
名著《宇宙意识》 (Cosmic consciousness)的作者——心理师理查德•巴克认为，光的幻象是一个经验是否属于宇宙性的最重要基准。 …

entry.def: If you are conscious of something, you notice it or realize that it is happening.

example.ex: He was conscious of the faint, musky aroma of after-shave...
example.tran: 他注意到了须后水淡淡的麝香味。

example.ex: She was very conscious of Max studying her...
example.tran: 她非常清楚马克斯在仔细端详她。

entry.tran: (尤指由于不满或自觉重要而)注意的，关注的
entry.def: If you are conscious of something, you think about it a lot, especially because you are unhappy about it or because you think it is important.

example.ex: I'm very conscious of my weight...
He is acutely conscious that this transition will bring with it the risk of social unrest.
example.tran: 他非常清楚这种转变伴随着社会动乱的危险。

entry.def: A conscious decision or action is made or done deliberately with you giving your full attention to it.

example.ex: I don't think we ever made a conscious decision to have a big family...
example.tran: 我觉得我们没有刻意地决定要生很多孩子。

example.ex: Make a conscious effort to relax your muscles.

entry.def: Someone who is conscious is awake rather than asleep or unconscious.

example.ex: She was fully conscious all the time and knew what was going on.
example.tran: 她一直都很清醒，知道是怎么回事。

entry.tran: (记忆或想法)有意识的，意识到的
entry.def: Conscious memories or thoughts are ones that you are aware of.

example.ex: He had no conscious memory of his four-week stay in hospital...
example.tran: 他对自己住院的4个星期没有任何有意识的记忆。

example.ex: Beneath the conscious mind there are many levels of the unconscious.
example.tran: 在意识心理之下存在很多层次的无意识。

sentences.sentence: "she consciously played with the idea of inviting them"

auth_sentence.content: We have seen pictures of unself-consciously gaping tourists before.
auth_sentence.res_content: We have seen pictures of unself-consciously gaping tourists before.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We have seen pictures of unself-consciously gaping tourists before.

auth_sentence.content: Do I see many physicians consciously milking this system?
auth_sentence.res_content: Do I see many physicians consciously milking this system?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Do I see many physicians consciously milking this system?

auth_sentence.content: Summers self-consciously adopted many of Rubin's managerial techniques.
auth_sentence.res_content: Summers self-consciously adopted many of Rubin's managerial techniques.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Summers self-consciously adopted many of Rubin's managerial techniques.

Sentence.sentence: Many policy measures to control obesity（肥胖症）assume that people consciously and rationally choose what and how much they eat and therefore focus on providing information and more access to healthier foods," note the two researchers.
Of course no one thinks about that consciously.

sentences.en: No person of independent mind will copy consciously.
sentences.cn: 没有一个独立思考的人会有意识地模仿。

sentences.en: She realized how tense she was and consciously relaxed.
sentences.cn: 她发觉自己很紧张，于是有意识地放松了一下。

sentences.en: He claims that the writer never consciously formulated his own theoretical position.
sentences.cn: 他声称该作家从未有意识地阐明他自己的理论见解。
